title: Ticket #5695: add knob MAX_TIME_SKIP
description:
Currently, if the condor_master notices a change of more than 20 minutes in the system clock, it restarts HTCondor. This 20 minute value is hard-coded.

To help support HTCondor running on virtual machines that could hibernate, we want a patch that allows this time to be configured via a config knob MAX_TIME_SKIP. The default value for MAX_TIME_SKIP is 1200 seconds (20 min).
